title: What has more value? 2x $50 RP lol cards or just $100 from credit card?
body: Do they both give the same amount of RP? Thanks

replies.body:
$100 of RP from the in game store = 12,100

$50 RP card = 7200 (I think, but apparently according to the internets 50 dollar RP cards don't exist in OCE, even though I have seen them in shops before)

7200 x 2 = 14400

So yeah 2x $50 RP cards gives you more RP. However I'm not entirely sure because I couldn't find the amount of RP you get online, so I just used the amount that people get in the US for my answer.

50 dollar cards have 5900 rp, same as buying in store with card.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/MXv9uHnL-rp-adjustment-in-oceania
The US has different dollar to us use your head.

I know... I specifically said I couldn't find 50 dollars of RP in AU dollars, so I just used US dollars...

Maybe your the one who should "use their head".

No, because using your head would mean you actually searched it up and instead of giving an incorrect response to a question and then saying it with uncertainty.

If you know US has a different dollar to us, why the hell would you bother saying it? That makes that sentence double the dumb.

You used the amount that people get in the US which is obviously different and compared it to the amount you get it in OCE. There is just no logics. "Specifically" pointing out that you have made errors in your calculation doesn't make me dumb for correcting you.

I'm a little confused? I'm trying to help out this guy and your outright calling me stupid for no reason whatsoever? 

And like you have the right to say anything, I put effort into my answer and all you did is come along and basically harass me with a comment which took little or no thought whatsoever.

I did search up my facts... I even said that I couldn't find the price for 50 dollar RP cards anywhere online...

If what I'm saying is stupid and you view my comment as not logical then why did YOU bother saying anything? Quite frankly I feel you are just saying this because you are the type who enjoy arguing with people. 

Please do not reply to me. I never wished for you to come along and reply with a mean and nasty comment because your ego allows you to do so. If you do, I am forewarning you now that I will report you for harassment if you do so.

Mean nasty comment? What kind of victim complex? How is this harassment? My initial comment corrected you by saying US has a different dollar, and I said "use your head" which is exactly same thing you send to me, don't pretend you are an angel.

Yes, you intended to help him out, but you were incorrect so I'm not going to let information go misinformed. You reply to me with a defensive/passive aggressive answer that doesn't make any sense because you just admitted that you were wrong and tried to make me sound dumb?

I actually never said you were stupid, the most I said was that sentence was dumb. You are been so upset because I told you that the US dollar is like 1.31 AUS dollar, therefore they get more RP for $50, pretty basic.

The reason I bothered saying something when I think your comment is not logical is because it isn't logical. What if he bought 2 $50 RP and basically lost value for his money? Is that the intended outcome?

All I am asking is instead of posting an uncertain and not researched conclusion even if you INTEND to help someone, someone else who knows which one has more value is better off commenting, such as below.

Riot or a moderator isn't going to acknowledge your report for harassment for several reasons.

1. Your first reply said the same thing I did that you consider to be harassment.

2. You have just argued with me and then used your last statement to make it seem like I am the only one arguing towards you.

3. I stated an obvious fact about comparing regional RP value. If you don't want to be corrected, don't post an in-certain answer. This isn't yahoo answers or whatever, this is a forum. People are going to "argue" with you.

Don't resort to the old "Please don't reply to me". "I never wished for you to come along and reply with a mean and nasty comment because your ego allows you to do so".

If we were in public I would say the exact same thing because if a guy goes out and wastes money due to misinformation there is no reason not to prevent that.

Also, when I said you should actually research, you claim you did, but you didn't. Researching doesn't mean if you can't find something you just put a random figure, it means you find out what you are looking for.

You ATTEMPTED to research, but if you couldn't find what you are looking for you should just continue along for your day. I thank you for your intent to be helpful, but stop putting on this defensive and passive aggressive shell when all I did was make sense.

For example, Annie Bot's Wife down there has what the OP needed to know, and posted it around the same time as you. Their answer explained about bonus RP and used correct numbers.

Harassment: Aggressive pressure or intimidation

"Use your head" is both very aggressive and intimidating. As for the rest of your response? I'm not gonna bother writing about it as most of it quite frankly just bullshit.

I did say I wasn't going to reply, but harrassment is a subject I'm very passionate about. You did harrass me. I am going to report you for that, and we are done here,

Thank you for wasting a whole 30 mins of my life.
If someone comes into your house and try's to stab you, would you just let them?

You were rude and aggressive in your response, regardless of your correctness. I personally see this as a borderline case, a little further and I would have removed it. Either way his reporting it as harassment/offensive was perfectly valid, you can report what you like and we'll see it, and while he isn't an 'angel' he was understandably defensive.

Personally I try to be pretty conservative with removing content as OCE tends to have more... crass ways of saying things than say NA, so generally I will only remove things that clearly break one of the rules. That said, you were unnecessarily rude. Was he right to say it back? No. But was it really necessary to say it to him in such a way in the first place?
i think 7200 was when riot gave bonus rp

$100 - 12,100
$50 -  5900
x2 $50 - 11,800.

$100 you get more due to the bonus Riot points.

OCE RP Prices: 

For Credit Card
BASE+BONUS=TOTAL

50 AUD/NZD - 5200+700=5900
100 AUD/NZD - 10400+1700=12100

~_~_~

Tl;dr: You'd get 11,800 RP for 2 50 AU/NZD, but 12,100 for one 100 AUD/NZD card, so buying the 100 one is better.
$50 2cards will actually cost you $70 or $80 bcoz of promotion in stores, so its upto you
I haven't seen a $100 card in game stores near me for months well I'm not sure maybe they all go when i go in there lul...
Pretty sure you get bonus Rp for buying it from the in game store
